channel.title: A Radio Show (Electronic DJs Welcomed!)
channel.description:
[b]What is it?[/b] Hello, I was wondering if anyone would be interested in taking part in a scheduled event for moparisthebest/moparscape. This event will consist of a line-up of DJ sets from fellow people in the community and feature an assortment of electronic dance music genres. Due to the extreme amount of coordinate necessary to make all of the sets live, most of the sets will pre-recorded and broadcasted (I can let a few people do things live if I see fit). I am also offering one, possibly two sets.
[b]What genres should I expect/want to play?[/b] * House * Drum and Bass * Dubstep * IDM * Breakbeat * Hard Dance * Techno * Trance
[b]When is it?[/b] Well, that is up to you all. Generally, it would be best if it was soon, but not too soon that it doesn't give listeners and DJs enough time to prepare. Once this thread has had a decent amount of replies, the event coordinator(s) will figure out when is the best time to conduct this.
[b]I want to DJ, how do I?[/b] Sign up here with the following information: [code] DJ name (if applicable): Time zone: Genre(s): Performance preference (live or recorded): Preferred date of show (DD/MM): [/code]
[b]I want to listen, how do I?[/b] An official thread will be made once this event has been scheduled with detailed instructions on how to tune in! Also, to help us plan please tell us your preferred date of show (DD/MM format).
[b]Applications:[/b] [quote=".Unlimited"]DJ name (if applicable): DJ Syn Time zone: EST Genre(s): House, Dubstep Performance preference (live or recorded): Recorded Preferred date of show (DD/MM): Whenever[/quote] [quote="Skyro"]DJ name (if applicable): DJ Skyro. Time zone: GMT (+10) Genre(s): Dubstep, Hardstyle, Hardcore, Electro, Trance, Hard Dance. Performance preference (live or recorded): Live. Preferred date of show (DD/MM): Whenever.[/quote] [quote="oldschool-scape"]DJ name: DJ MTH Time zone: Paris Genre(s):Hardstyle,Dubstep,(Own tracks), House,Dirty house, Dance Performance preference: Live Preferred date of show (DD/MM):Doesn't Matther[/quote] [quote="Mopman"]Sure, why not.
DJ name (if applicable): I don't fucking know :P Time zone: GMT Genre(s): Mostly D&B Performance preference (live or recorded): Live Preferred date of show (DD/MM): Don't mind, preferably evening[/quote] [quote="Stupit"]DJ name (if applicable): DJ Equil Time zone: GMT+/-3:00 Genre(s): Dubstep, House, Drum and Bass, Techno, Trance Performance preference (live or recorded): Live Preferred date of show (DD/MM): Anytime basically.[/quote]
mscp thread: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,538782.msg3942415.html#msg3942415

item.title: A Radio Show (Electronic DJs Welcomed!)
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

What is it?
Hello, I was wondering if anyone would be interested in taking part in a scheduled event for moparisthebest/moparscape. This event will consist of a line-up of DJ sets from fellow people in the community and feature an assortment of electronic dance music genres. Due to the extreme amount of coordinate necessary to make all of the sets live, most of the sets will pre-recorded and broadcasted (I can let a few people do things live if I see fit). I am also offering one, possibly two sets.

What genres should I expect/want to play?

  • House
  • Drum and Bass
  • Dubstep
  • IDM
  • Breakbeat
  • Hard Dance
  • Techno
  • Trance

When is it?
Well, that is up to you all. Generally, it would be best if it was soon, but not too soon that it doesn’t give listeners and DJs enough time to prepare. Once this thread has had a decent amount of replies, the event coordinator(s) will figure out when is the best time to conduct this.

I want to DJ, how do I?
Sign up here with the following information:

DJ name (if applicable): 
Time zone: 
Genre(s): 
Performance preference (live or recorded): 
Preferred date of show (DD/MM):

I want to listen, how do I?
An official thread will be made once this event has been scheduled with detailed instructions on how to tune in! Also, to help us plan please tell us your preferred date of show (DD/MM format).

Applications:
